Posts.Content: Arnab wrote: Hey everyone, Hope everyone is recovering well and responding well to the treatments !! I have recently been diagnosed with Liver Mets. Oncologist has advised me gem carbo treatment. Wanted to ask, has anyone received GEM CARBO - gemcitabine and Carboplatin for treatment of LIVER METS. how is the response? Any dangerous side effects apart from normal ones like nausea,vomiting and mostly tiredness.Mainly for ER+ PR- HER2-, is it effective? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: GEM CARBO treatment for ER+ PR- HER2- Arnab Moderators
